review.reviewBody:
Gobi and and kids butter chicken was delicious but kids butter chicken is under kids meal, but only get a small butter chicken nothing with it. 
So shouldnt be under kids meal heading.
The food was soooo good. We got the meal deals and the quantity was amazing.  11/10!!!
terrible taste. terrible quantity. unnecessarily overpriced. awful dish
great, quantity was amazing.  tasty was awesome
